MilestoneList.title: Getting Started with Public Speaking üò®
MilestoneList.description: In this module we tackle the one element that makes public speaking difficult: fear. Unlike writing a memo or designing a slide deck, presenting a speech puts you directly in front of an audience. Public speaking is wrapped up in the fear of immediate judgment and of lasting rejection.

MilestoneList.title: A Formula For Successful Presentation ü§ì
MilestoneList.goal: Learn the practical formula for successful presentations : Creaivity
MilestoneList.description: William establishes this structure, and then breaks down it down into modular elements, so the most complex presentations can be created easily, revised effectively, and delivered confidently. Still, no one-size-fits-all outline, no rigid set of rules, is capable of expressing your own personality and unlocking your own brilliance, and so William goes beyond the basic formula to teach you the secret ingredient to public speaking: creativity.

MilestoneList.title: Getting Your Python On üêç

We‚Äôll learn about getting your environment set up and installing additional Python modules that will help you along the way. We‚Äôll rundown interpreted versus compiled language, and how they differ from each other. We‚Äôll dive into the benefits of automation, and point out common pitfalls so you can avoid them. Finally, we‚Äôll learn about Qwiklabs, which will be used for graded assessments..

MilestoneList.title: Managing Files with Python üìÇ
MilestoneList.description: In this module, you‚Äôll learn about reading and writing to files and the commands that will enable you to do this. We‚Äôll learn the importance of managing files and how we can navigate through different directories. We‚Äôll understand how to work with files and how there is a layer of abstraction between Python and the operating system. Finally, we‚Äôll dive into learning about CSV files and how to best utilize them.
